DECLARE @a TABLE (sch varchar(100), tab varchar(200))
INSERT INTO @a 
SELECT table_schema, table_name 
FROM information_schema.TABLES 
WHERE table_schema= 'Purchasing' 
    or table_name = 'StockItems' 
    or table_name = 'PackageTypes'
    or table_name = 'TransactionTypes'
    or table_name = 'PaymentMethods'
    or table_name = 'People';

Drop table if exists masterTable;

Create table masterTable (
    ID int identity(1,1),
    [Key] nvarchar(200),
    [Value] nvarchar(max));

Insert into masterTable ([Key],[Value])
Values ('Purchasing load', @a);

SELECT * from masterTable;
